DESCRIPTION: Allows you to create an item in the server store.
INTERFACE:
Welcome to the item creation interface for the server store, click on the reaction corresponding to what you want to configure:
:one: {{statusName}} Name ({{name}})
:two: {{statusPrice}} Price ({{price}}ama)
:three: {{statusAvailable}} Available ({{available}})
:four: {{statusMaxPerUser}} Max Per User ({{maxPerUser}})
:five: {{statusRole}} Role? ({{role}} - {{roleID}})
You can cancel by clicking :x: or by sending `cancel` in the chat while configuring a parameter.
ASK_NAME: {{loading}} What is the name of your item?
INVALID_NAME: The name of your item is too long.
ALREADY_ITEM: There is already an item with that name in the shop.
ASK_PRICE: {{loading}} What is the price of your item?
ASK_AVAILABLE: {{loading}} What is the available quantity of this item?
ASK_MAX_PER_USER: {{loading}} What is the maximum quantity allowed per user.
ASK_ROLE_ID: {{loading}} What is the id of this role?
MISSING_NAME: Please configure the name of this item.
MISSING_PRICE: Please configure the price of this item.
MISSING_AVAILABLE: Please configure the available quantity of this item.
MISSING_MAX_PER_USER: Please configure the maximum quantity allowed per user of this item.
CANCELED: The creation of your item has been canceled.
CANCELED_TIME: The creation of your item took too long and was therefore canceled, please try again.
NORMAL_LIMIT: You have reached the maximum allowed of 5 items in the shop for a normal server.
PREMIUM_LIMIT: You have reached the maximum allowed of 10 items in the shop for a premium server.
PREMIUM_GOLD_LIMIT: You have reached the maximum allowed of 15 items in the shop for a premium gold server.
